name: Tappie Plane
description:
Tappie Plane was just going for a nice joyride, but there’s one problem: THE ENGINE IS FAILING! Tappie Plane needs your help otherwise it will start falling, all flappy-like. Tappie-tap your iPhone and make sure you don’t steer that plane into any mountains otherwise it’s going to crash!

Featues:
-This app is Game Center enabled with leaderboards!
-Earn bronze, silver and, gold medals for your scores! You can see how many medals you earned by checking out the Game Center leaderboards!
-Control the plane with taps!
-Four different colored planes: Red, Green, Yellow, and Blue!

Don’t let Tappie Plane fall! So what are you waiting for? This game is FREE! Start playing NOW!
